author: J. Edward Moreno
title: Virginia governor asks general assembly to move May elections to November
description: Virginia Gov. Ralph Northam (D) on Wednesday asked the state's general assembly to move the commonwealth's May general election to Nov. 3 to mitigate the spread of the coronavirus.
content:
Virginia Gov. Ralph Northam (D) on Wednesday asked the states general assembly to move the commonwealths May general election to Nov. 3 to mitigate the spread of the coronavirus. 
The governors announcement comes the day after Wisconsin held its primary elec… [+1307 chars]
